channel.title: Jagex now taking payments
channel.description:
http://www.runescape.com/kbase/guid/bans_and_mutes
Banned Account Reinstatement If Jagex bans any account as a result of your breach of the Rules of RuneScape and you have exhausted the Offence Appeals Process, Jagex may, in its absolute discretion, give you an opportunity to make a fixed payment to reinstate the account. Any membership credit that is associated with an account cannot be used to pay for such reinstatement. Please note that throughout the period during which the account was banned, any membership credit will continue to expire. Jagex is not obliged to reinstate any accounts. You are not obliged to exercise the option to reinstate your account. If you are offered the opportunity, it is entirely up to you whether you make any such payment to reinstate an account. Any gains or advantages that Jagex considers were made as a result of using macros shall be removed from your account. You accept that the account will be returned to you, adjusted by Jagex to take account of the cheating offence, and no discussion will be entered into regarding the status of a returned account.

Whats that account got on it?
[/quote]’
There fucking money hungry pricks, Of course they want more money.[/quote]

item.description:
@gravenfire23 wrote:

Fridder:

Hmm… So, when does this come into affect? I’m looking forward to pissing away lots of money to get a RuneScape account back. I also heard somewhere that you can buy some sort of a pin from a store and redeem it with Diango in Draynor and you get a holiday item… Is this true, because I went to Diango and it said something about a PIN.

[quote=“abatssk8ter, post:29, topic:380998”]Where may i submit this payment :).
I’m not paying over 50$ lol.

@Fridder, i believe the pin you obtain from rune-fest.[/quote]

If you read it there is no forum they will contact you (or atleast thats what i think)

See here

Jagex is not obliged to reinstate any accounts. You are not obliged to exercise the option to reinstate your account. If you are offered the opportunity, it is entirely up to you whether you make any such payment to reinstate an account.

Lmfao at your sig? why the fuck am i gay?

item.title: Jagex now taking payments
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

[quote=“krackkid, post:20, topic:380998”][quote author=kingman002 link=topic=476814.msg3487880#msg3487880 date=1296732749]
jagex has been taking payments, my dad didnt like me playing rs so he called jagex n said his credit card was stolen, then they perm banned my acc, then they unbanned after 7 months cause i paid them 45$ (bull shit amount for a poor acc lvl 104, coulda got a rich stronger acc for 45$ maybe)
[/quote]I don’t believe you.[/quote]
Never said you had to believe me, but it’s the truth.

[quote=“Rich, post:24, topic:380998”][quote author=kingman002 link=topic=476814.msg3487880#msg3487880 date=1296732749]
jagex has been taking payments, my dad didnt like me playing rs so he called jagex n said his credit card was stolen, then they perm banned my acc, then they unbanned after 7 months cause i paid them 45$ (bull shit amount for a poor acc lvl 104, coulda got a rich stronger acc for 45$ maybe)
[/quote]
You’ve always been able to pay back negative membership credit to redeem your account, this is different.[/quote]

It wasn’t negative membership. He got tired of paying to so he lied to them and said his credit card was stolen, so they banned me. Then 7 months later I paid the $45 (just realized RWT :P) and they unbanned me. (btw this was in 07-08)

Read full topic
